Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test
Uses:      shr.core

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

Entry:   CodeConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a code constraint on the value"
Value:          Coding = FOO#bar "FooBar"

Entry:   CodeConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with a code constraint on the value's child"
Value:          CodedFromValueSet
                CodedFromValueSet.Coding = FOO#bar "FooBar"

Entry:   CodeConstraintOnField
Description:    "It is a group entry with a code constraint on a field"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       Coding
                Coding = FOO#bar "FooBar" 0..1

Entry:   CodeConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:    "It is a group entry with a code constraint on a field's child"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       CodedFromValueSet 0..1
                CodedFromValueSet.Coding = FOO#bar "FooBar"

Entry:   SystemlessCodeConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a system-less code constraint on the value"
Property:       CodedFromValueSet
Value:          Coding = #bar

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        CodedFromValueSet
Value:          Coding from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded (required)
